channel.title: All Access Community Project [Recolors Wanted!]
channel.description:
[center][size=24pt][b]Progress[/b][/size][/center] [center][size=18pt]||||||||||||||||||||[/size][/center] [center][size=18pt]10%[/size][/center]
I think we can change the way people think about what an RSPS can really be. Put your skills to the test and help us make what I would call a 'specialty area'. Basically I want to try and replicate a video game and place it into a RSPS. This will take a fair amount of modelling. On this project we'll be taking the Zelda concept and replicating it to be added to a RPSP. I'll go into detail with this later.
Ripping a model is easy if you follow these tutorials: [url=http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=S6qOtOgmkT8][Tutorial 1][/url] [url=http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=7ZGgd0Q8IXw][Tutorial 2][/url]
If you want to participate in this project, try creating a model of one of these or rip it from a ROM:
[size=18pt][b]Weapons/Armor[/b][/size] Kokiri Sword Biggoron Sword Fairy Sword (MM) Fairy Slingshot Fairy Boomerang Megaton Hammer Fairy Bow Hero's Bow (MM) Deku Shield Hylian Shield Mirror Shield Mirror Shield (MM) Hover Boots Golden Gauntlets Master Sword [url=http://www.mediafire.com/?4dpg21uglvd401s]MQO[/url] Silver Gauntlets Majora's Mask [url=http://www.mediafire.com/?hm34hmmp58ikrlm]ZIP[/url]
[size=18pt][b]NPCs[/b][/size] Young Zelda Adult Zelda Deku Scrub Navi Wolf White Wolf Goron Darunia Stalchild Zora Saria [url=http://www.mediafire.com/?ot90cp13j6f7e9d]MQO[/url] Dark Link [url=http://www.mediafire.com/?8kripng6za5b9oa]MQO[/url] Adult Link [url=http://www.mediafire.com/?fmvn9ifmgty7gn7]MQO[/url] Young Link [url=http://www.mediafire.com/?55r2vsdjxyay52a]MQO[/url] Happy Mask Man [url=http://www.mediafire.com/?e8t91vs0onkhlqu]MQO[/url]
[size=18pt][b]Bosses[/b][/size] Barinade Morpha Twinrova Ganondorf Ganon Odolwa Goht Gyorg Twinmold Ghoma [url=http://www.mediafire.com/?iad4gqqp371nqnd]MQO[/url] Volvagia [url=http://www.mediafire.com/?kd9b7a03btrp9r2]MQO[/url] Dodongo [url=http://www.mediafire.com/?gar44jb5b6r030i]MQO[/url] Bongo Bongo [url=http://www.mediafire.com/?3pt7dz3364m300j]MQO[/url] Link (Fierce Deity) [url=http://www.mediafire.com/?d5j27c2r1xf8j7a]MQO[/url] Majora's Incarnation [url=http://www.mediafire.com/?lh5n161txyoa641]MQO[/url] Majora's Mask [url=http://www.mediafire.com/?qoa4s0ejj0m6abc]ZIP[/url] Majora's Wrath [url=http://www.mediafire.com/?65t2s2a7nt13qlc]ZIP[/url]
[size=18pt][b]Objects/Items[/b][/size] Small chest Zora Scale (blue) Golden Scale Deku Seed Master Sword Pedestal Triforce [url=http://www.mediafire.com/?b5gjdvieiq68468]MQO[/url]
[size=18pt][b]Environments[/b][/size] Kokiri Forest Kakariko Village Goron Shrine Zora's Domain Temple of Time
I'm not sure how we are going to pull off environments but I just threw it in there in the case that you guys wish to do environments.

item.title: All Access Community Project [Recolors Wanted!]
item.dc:creator: @sjustin1996 sjustin1996
item.description:
@sjustin1996 wrote:

Just a note guys, these don’t have to be from the N64 game, they can be from the newer ones too for higher poly count, and with that, they look more suitable for an RSPS.

Read full topic

item.title: All Access Community Project [Recolors Wanted!]
item.dc:creator: @Lazyness Lazyness
item.description:
@Lazyness wrote:

I’m really sorry guys but I’m a little disappointed. The community showed a lot of promise work-wise. I know a lot of you have been busy and all but even one model helps. You don’t even have to make it yourself! Apart from two models (a third without a download link), I’ve done all of them. I have a lot of work to do still and it was my project to begin with but I was hoping that the community would be interested. If you guys still don’t want to participate then that’s alright but if you want to help (even just a little tiny bit), please do. I’m terrible at animating and if you guys are any good at that and are feeling up to it then please, please, please help me out by animating a few models. :o

Sorry if I frustrate any of you.

Read full topic

item.title: All Access Community Project [Recolors Wanted!]
item.dc:creator: @the_wanderer The Wanderer
item.description:
@the_wanderer wrote:

[quote=“Lazyness, post:79, topic:383173”][quote author=the wanderer link=topic=478950.msg3514283#msg3514283 date=1298831894]
http://www.mediafire.com/?63clh0egdrip9dq
Link with materials.
[/quote]

What an INCREDIBLE model! My question is… How in the world are we going to be able to fit this into an RSPS? It’s a wooping 5,176 faces! Will an RSPS be able to hold this sort of work?

Brilliant work nonetheless![/quote]
Ripped. Haha. If it is an npc just split it into multiple models like RS does for it’s big bosses. If it is for the character, then you would need to split it into gear. Like chest, hat, legs, arms, and such. I have most of them animated somewhere too…

Read full topic

Brilliant work nonetheless!

item.title: All Access Community Project [Recolors Wanted!]
item.dc:creator: @Lazyness Lazyness
item.description:
@Lazyness wrote:

[quote=“reyx7, post:76, topic:383173”][quote author=Lazyness link=topic=478950.msg3513638#msg3513638 date=1298780391]

Explain please?

When you are in the game and extract models, you’ll extract the entire area that you are in when you send all of the models to the VRML.

I’ve made quite a lot of progress today. I’m almost finished with the storyline for this quest. Nearly 2,000 words.

I’ve also attempted to animate Dark Link to start and I’ve done the priorities, VSKINs and TSKINs perfectly but I’m unable to make animations using RSPoser. It wont let me move anything around or even set X, Y or Z axises.

Here is the basic storyline: http://www.mediafire.com/?ofu4cavqh141yrv

There’s a lot to do still. I’m just going to take things one step at a time.
[/quote]

So you have to play the game to get to the models? Some of my 2 favorite things :D[/quote]

Yes. If you are curious on how to do this, I’ve provided tutorials.

Read full topic

reyx7:

Explain please?

When you are in the game and extract models, you’ll extract the entire area that you are in when you send all of the models to the VRML.

I’ve made quite a lot of progress today. I’m almost finished with the storyline for this quest. Nearly 2,000 words.

I’ve also attempted to animate Dark Link to start and I’ve done the priorities, VSKINs and TSKINs perfectly but I’m unable to make animations using RSPoser. It wont let me move anything around or even set X, Y or Z axises.

Here is the basic storyline: http://www.mediafire.com/?ofu4cavqh141yrv

There’s a lot to do still. I’m just going to take things one step at a time.

item.dc:creator: @Lazyness Lazyness
item.description:
@Lazyness wrote:

[quote=“reyx7, post:71, topic:383173”]Rip them from the a ROM?
I’d do it, i just dont know how i would convert a model to a .meq file.[/quote]

I’ll be making a video today explaining how to do it.

Edit: I’ve loaded the video links to the main post. Check them out!

Also - I’ve finished a few more models and they look quite nice but I’m a little curious on what I’m going to do for some of them. My Majora’s Wrath turned out perfectly and I don’t want it to go to waste so how would I go about making the textures readable even if you don’t have the .bmp files?

And lololol at this (got it while I was ripping models from MM):

Read full topic

item.title: All Access Community Project [Recolors Wanted!]
item.dc:creator: @Lazyness Lazyness
item.description:
@Lazyness wrote:

[quote=“shrogg, post:66, topic:383173”]i can give Kakariko Village a shot and the following

Small chest
Mirror Shield

(i beleve i can rip enviroments straight out of the rom >:D)
BUT it will be un textured and since you can only rip the models from the current area that you are in, i can only get the starting village :D[/quote]

Here’s the hard thing about environments. We can’t take an entire environment and place it into an RSPS. That would look terrible and it wouldn’t fit. What you can do is take all of the objects, houses and trees and what not and place each into its own MQO file and we’ll replicate the environment. The rest… Go for it!

ranger squad:

Could you tell me HOW you are ripping this?

I prefer this guide as it shows how what to use and how to use it but I think what I’m going to do tonight is make a video guide myself on how to do it.

Read full topic

Zeldapedia

Ordon Sword

The Ordon Sword is a sword from The Legend of Zelda: Twilight Princess. The second sword obtained in the game, the Ordon Sword was forged by Rusl as a gift to the Royal Family of Hyrule together with the Ordon Shield. The steel from which the Ordon...

item.title: All Access Community Project [Recolors Wanted!]
item.dc:creator: @Lazyness Lazyness
item.description:
@Lazyness wrote:

the wanderer:

Would you prefer Link with materials or textures?

Both work. If it takes less work to throw the model into an RSPS then go with that because if you use a lot of textures, you’ll need to upload every texture with the MQO/DAT file.

I’ve added more models to be recolored. The Master Sword is really, REALLY simple. o.O It’s funny to see how simple these complex games really are.

Read full topic

item.dc:creator: @Lazyness Lazyness
item.description:
@Lazyness wrote:

I’ve nearly finished the models for young Link and Saria but I can’t get the textures right. If any of you want to take the model and finish, there are only TWO things to do on each! The eyes and the mouths.

I’ve also gone ahead and ripped a few models from OoT and attempted to recolor some. If you wish to finish recoloring the models, download the MQO files and upload the end result!

Read full topic
